text: Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa zanonu duxtaroni xud va zanoni mu'minon ʙigu, ki codari xudro ʙar sar pusand, to saru ruju sari sinaho pusida ʙosand. In munosiʙtar ast, to ʙa pokdomani sinoxta savand va mavridi ozor voqe' nagardand. Va Alloh omurzandai gunohoni guzastai sumo ast va ʙa sumo ʙisjor mehruʙon ast, ki ʙarojaton halolu haromro ravsan soxtaast
